name: Call Me Skyfish
description:
Skyfish is an angry orange fish who must bubble-shoot and tongue swing his way through this humorous platform adventure. He now faces his greatest enemies like his ex-girlfriend, floating heads, tsunamis, screaming cats, and a radioactive stick-figure hedgehog!! Laid-back silly fun is here!

Players can expect an old school indie platforming adventure run-n-gun with tongue swinging action! If you like unique indie platformers, then this is the game for you!
